name: Snowglobe
description:
Lost and alone, you awaken in a barren place, an isolated temple before you. Inside, a way out...

Inspired by the point and click games of the past, Snowglobe is a virtual reality take on a familiar concept.

In this short adventure game, you'll meet interesting individuals, explore a strange world, and collect items to use in inventive ways to find your way out of the rift.

Coming soon to VR.
